snippet: The police in the Cologne area detained nine men early Wednesday and searched at least 20 homes in raids against people suspected of supporting terrorism.
abstract: Police in Germany's Cologne area detain nine men and search at least 20 homes in raids against people suspected of supporting terrorism; two are suspected of helping five men travel from Germany to Syria to join terrorists there.
lead_paragraph: The police in the Cologne area detained nine men early Wednesday and searched at least 20 homes in raids against people suspected of supporting terrorism.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
